subject: Television
Baseball
All Star Games
lead_paragraph: The All-Star Game’s television audience has been cut in half over the last 20 years, and now the game draws a smaller audience than do many episodes of “The Walking Dead” on AMC.
snippet: The All-Star Game’s television audience has been cut in half over the last 20 years, and now the game draws a smaller audience than do many episodes of “The Walking Dead” on AMC.
